algorithm_technique: Stack-based parsing to handle nested repetitions and build the decoded string.
problem_summary_simple: Decode a string with repeating encoded substrings within brackets.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a stack to manage repeat counts and intermediate strings, processing nested structures recursively.
key_insights: The nested nature of the encoding strongly suggests a stack-based approach.
When encountering '[', push the current repeat count and string onto the stack.
When encountering ']', pop from the stack, repeat the current string, and append to the popped string.
